name: Piano Tunes
description:
PianoTunes is a Piano Simulator for PC.  You can enjoy playing your favourite songs on your keyboard directly without any external hardware.

  • It consists of 61 keys which can be played through a simple keyboard directly.
  • The inbuilt songs can be Auto-played or learnt through practice with the falling tiles.
  • You can Auto-play any song with its midi file with the help of the Specific Piano Tunes Midi Reader which renders Midi files into a Piano Tunes readable format.
  • There is a Guide Button to help beginners learn new songs and get comfortable with the keys.
  • You can also create your own songs by writing down the notes in the In-Built Auto-Player and replay them by saving them in an ordinary text file.
  • And many more in-game features!

There is already a guide in the game if you find yourself lost as to how Auto-Player and the falling tiles work. 

Early Access

This is the alpha version of PianoTunes and can be downloaded below. This demo contains the basic functions of the main app while others are in development.

  •  The Auto-Player will only play the sound of the notes which are put in and not show the falling tiles.
  • Image or gif cannot be inserted in the background.
  • The guide button which stops the falling tiles as they approach the bottom will be unavailable.

This version is a great way to practice and develop your own playstyle.
